body.p:
Louisville May 6t 1861
His Excellency Bariah Magoffin
Frankfort

Dear Sir This is to introduce the bearer Mr W G Timberlake who will explain to you the object he has in view in visiting Frankfort -- If the suggestion he makes meets your approbation and you can consistently further his wishes I will be obliged --

Yours very respectfully
Tho H Hunt
